titles.title: CURB Act
CURB Act
Cutting Unnecessary Red Tape and Bureaucracy Act
To require that in a notice of proposed rulemaking for a new rule, the notice shall identify three rules which the agency intends to repeal.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Cutting Unnecessary Red Tape and Bureaucracy Act or the CURB Act
This bill requires federal agencies to identify three rules that the agency is repealing for any proposed new rule, unless the proposed rule is required by statute.
